You http://wn.com/Allen_Iverson_55_pts_Playoff_Career_High_vs_NO_Hornets_2003 Philadelphia 98, New Orleans 90 Allen Iverson 's 55 Gives Sixers Game 1 In the illustious history of the Philadelphia 76ers, nobody-- not Wilt, not Julius Erving , not Moses-- had an individual performance like Allen Iverson 's against the New Orleans Hornets. Allen Iverson scored a team playoff-record 55 points as the 76ers defeated the Hornets, 98-90, in Game One of their Eastern Conference first-round series. ''He was on fire, Hornets coach Paul Silas said of Allen Iverson , who fell eight points shy of Michael Jordan 's NBA playoff record set exactly 17 years ago in a double-overtime loss at Boston. The Daily Caller reports Rep. Mike Pence ( R-IN), a possible contender for president in 2012, has announced that he will NOT run for the White House: As reported by the Indianapolis Star, Mike Pence has circulated a letter to supporters announcing the decision. ''In the choice between seeking national office and serving Indiana in some capacity, we choose Indiana,'' wrote Mike Pence . ''We will not seek the Republican nomination for president in 2012.''
